Name: Chocolate makes you happy
About the game: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets and explosions. The goal of the player is to keep the cookies on the chocolate bar for some time to pass the level. In Chocolate makes you happy : - 50 levels - Explosions - Achievements - Cool Soundtrack - Sweets -Colorful art
